snippet.title: SOULFIRE: Launch Trailer (Open Beta 20/06/2019 on Steam)
snippet.description:
SOULFIRE is a battle royale fighter that pits more than 20 teams against each other in a struggle for win.Compared to similar games, it features a 2.5D souls-lite combat system. 

灵魂之火是一款高自由度的多人在线动作竞技游戏，每局最多60人参与。相比同类游戏，它的特色是横版下的魂味战斗系统。

the OPEN BETA of SOULFIRE on Steam will from June 20th to 27th (all day), 2019; and the EARLY ACCESS DAY will be on this summer, 2019 soon

开放测试将会在6月20日至6月27日于steam进行，EA版将在今年夏天抢先开启，尽情期待 (　･ิω･ิ)ノิ 

beta test announcement: https://steamcommunity.com/games/822800/announcements/detail/2430169961248740686

Steam store: https://store.steampowered.com/app/822800/Soulfire/

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/soulfiregame

Twitter: https://twitter.com/soulfiregame
.
